ğŸš€SpaceTech is in full swing! Join the live webcast now to catch Dr. Steve Chienâ€™s keynote, â€œTrusted Autonomy on Mars: A Case Study of the Mars 2020 Onboard Plannerâ€ Dr. Chien, NASA JPL Technical Group Supervisor, AI Group, is renowned for his leadership in AI deployment across various missions, including the Mars 2020 Perseverance Rover. More keynotes, panels, and talks throughout the day! Watch: https://lnkd.in/embitpuH

An exciting start to â€œAI in Actionâ€ Week at Northeastern University tonight! ğŸ‰ After opening remarks from Kenneth Henderson, Chancellor and Senior Vice President for Learning at Northeastern, hundreds of attendees joined in-person and online to hear a fascinating keynote from Steve Chien, a renowned computer scientist from the NASA Jet Propulsion Laboratory at Caltech, followed by closing remarks from our Executive Director, Usama Fayyad! Stay tuned for insights throughout "AI in Action" Week, and learn more about this weekâ€™s incredible lineup of #AI-focused events here: https://bit.ly/3IZ9BmC #artificialintelligence #AIevents #AIresearch #space #science #research #NASA #computerscience #AInews
